content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 参与条件 -</>
<@gray.note>· 完成主线任务：第一章 - 进程Ⅱ - 开拓前路</>

<@intru.bold>- 活动规则 -</>
<@gray.note>· 本活动包含一系列空间组挑战，每个空间组内包含若干个协议空间。</>
<@gray.note>· 管理员可通关对应协议空间，并获取一次性的通关奖励。</>
<@gray.note>· 每个空间组内，通关全部协议空间后，可获得对应的蚀刻章；完成协议空间的附加目标、并开启全部储藏箱后，对应协议空间将完美通关，全部协议空间完美通关后，蚀刻章会被镀层。</>
<@gray.note>· 如果空间组尚未解锁，请管理员继续推进主线任务以解锁相应空间组挑战。</>
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Participation Requirements -</>
<@gray.note>· Complete the main mission [Chapter Ⅰ Process Ⅱ: Paving the Way].</>

<@intru.bold>- Event Rules -</>
<@gray.note>· This event includes a series of Spatial Set challenges, while each Spatial Set contains a number of Protocol Spaces.</>
<@gray.note>· Complete these Protocol Spaces to claim a one-time completion reward.</>
<@gray.note>· Completing all Protocol Spaces within a Spatial Set rewards an engraved medal. Completing all bonus goals and opening all storage crates in the Protocol Spaces result in a perfect completion of the Protocol Space. Perfectly completing all Protocol Spaces within a Spatial Set trims the said engraved medal.</>
<@gray.note>· If a Spatial Set is locked, unlock it by progressing through the main mission.</>

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 购买次数及时间说明 -</>
·部分组合包存在购买次数限制。如因特殊原因购买了已达限购次数上限的组合包，将无法获得该组合包内容，同时按照购买价格返还对应数量的【衍质源石】。
·部分组合包存在购买时间限制。如因特殊原因在有效期外完成支付，该组合包内容将无法发放，同时按照购买价格返还对应数量的【衍质源石】。

<@intru.bold>- 组合包内限时道具说明 -</>
·部分组合包可能含有限时道具。管理员可在【购买商品 - 商品内容】中查看限时道具的具体信息。如在购买组合包后，其中的限时道具因到期失效，将无法补发。感谢管理员的理解与支持。

<@intru.bold>- 其他说明 - </>
·部分组合包需达成特定条件后方可购买，具体内容请以【采购中心】-【组合包】界面显示为准。
·组合包充值到账可能存在一定时间的延迟，请管理员耐心等待。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Purchase Limits and Time Limits -</>
· Some bundles come with purchase limits. For a bundle purchase that exceeds this limit due to special circumstances, the contents of the bundle will not be provided. Instead, an amount of [Origeometry] based on the value of the purchase will be returned to you.
· Some bundles have purchase time limits. For a bundle purchase where payment is only completed beyond this time limit due to special circumstances, the contents of the bundle will not be provided. Instead, an amount of [Origeometry] based on the value of the purchase will be returned to you.

<@intru.bold>- Limited-Time Items within Bundles -</>
· Some bundles may include limited-time items. Use the [Purchase - Item Contents] to view a bundle's actual contents. There is no compensation for expired items within a bundle. We apologize for any inconveniences caused.

<@intru.bold>- Other Details - </>
· Some bundles are only purchasable when certain criteria are met. For actual details, check the [Acquisition Center] - [Bundles] screen.
· Processing bundle purchase payments may take a while. Please be patient, Endministrator.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 月卡规则介绍 -</>
· 每次购买月卡，可立即获得【衍质源石】×12，同时获得30天的月卡权益。
· 月卡权益生效期间，每日登录可获得【嵌晶玉】×200和【应急理智加强剂】×1。
· 月卡的每日登录奖励将在每日服务器时间04:00刷新。

<@intru.bold>- 特殊提示 -</>
· 月卡权益生效期间，未登录而导致无法获得的奖励，将不会返还。
· 月卡权益最大可累积时间为180天。只有当月卡权益剩余时间≤150天时，才可继续购买月卡。
· 如因特殊情况导致过量购买，将不会累积月卡权益时间，同时根据购买价格返还对应数量的【衍质源石】。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Monthly Pass Rules -</>
· Each purchase of the Monthly Pass immediately gives [Origeometry]×12 and Monthly Pass perks for 30 days.
· While Monthly Pass perks are active, log in everyday to claim [Oroberyl]×200 and [Emergency Sanity Booster]×1.
· Monthly Pass daily login rewards are refreshed daily at 4:00 AM (Server Time).

<@intru.bold>- Special Reminders -</>
· While Monthly Pass perks are active, rewards missed for not logging in will not be returned.
· Monthly Pass perks can only last for a total of 180 days. Another Monthly Pass can only be purchased when the valid period of the Monthly Pass perks ≤150 days.
· For excessive purchases due to special circumstances, the valid period of the Monthly Pass perks will not stack. Instead, an amount of [Origeometry] based on the value of the purchase will be returned to you.

content.cn:
可在【采购中心 - 配额兑换所】中，将满潜能干员的信物转化为【集成配额】和【终点配额】。
当6星干员满潜能后，可将【信物】转化为【终点配额】×10。
当5星干员满潜能后，可将【信物】转化为【集成配额】×20。
当4星干员满潜能后，可将【信物】转化为【集成配额】×5。

【保障配额】可通过在某些途径获取相同干员获得。
以下获取相同干员规则适用于寻访、活动、采购中心等途径。
第2次及后续获取相同6星干员时，每次将转化为对应干员的【信物】×1和【保障配额】×50。
第2次及后续获取相同5星干员时，每次将转化为对应干员的【信物】×1和【保障配额】×10。
content.en:
Acquiring duplicate operators via certain channels converts the duplicate into [Bond Quota].
Rules for getting duplicate operators apply for: headhunting, events, and purchases from the Acquisition Center.
A 6★ operator duplicate converts to: [Token]×1 of the duplicated operator and [Bond Quota]×50.
A 5★ operator duplicate converts to: [Token]×1 of the duplicated operator and [Bond Quota]×10.

content.en:

Complete missions, tasks in the Operational Manual, and explore the world to earn Operational EXP.

<@intru.bold>- Authority Level -</>
Operational EXP earned can be used to raise your Authority Level, Endministrator. You will also acquire rewards for every level achieved.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 协议通行证 -</>
协议通行证上的每一项都是武库工程师认真采访干员们之后所列出的，最符合大家期待的支援项目。
每期协议通行证开启时，将默认解锁「基础配给」。
可购买「协议定制」，或通过消耗【衍质源石】解锁「源石配给」，以解锁更丰厚的奖励。

<@intru.bold>- 通行证经验及等级说明 -</>
可通过以下两种途径获取通行证经验，从而提升通行证等级并获得奖励。
· 完成通行证任务。（部分任务会在满足相应条件时或在一定时间后逐步释出）
· 在【行动手册-日常任务】中，领取活跃度达到上限时的奖励。
※ 当天的活跃度未达上限时，将于次日激活1枚「悠游便签」，最多同时激活3枚。（激活时间为次日服务器时间04:00）
※ 当活跃度达到上限时领取奖励，若有已激活的「悠游便签」，则将消耗1枚并使获得的通行证经验翻倍。（日常任务本身的奖励不会受到影响）

当期协议通行证达到等级上限后，可继续通过上述途径获取通行证经验。超出等级上限的通行证经验可累积以解锁循环奖励。

※ 特殊经验加成说明：若已解锁当期协议通行证的「源石配给」或「协议定制」，则获取通行证经验时，可分别获得3%的额外经验加成。两档经验加成可累加，最高可获得6%的额外经验加成。

<@intru.bold>- 通行证任务说明 -</>
· 周任务说明：协议通行证中，周任务会每隔7天阶段性释出。周任务会统一在当期协议通行证结束时重置。
· 启程任务说明：启程任务是一类特殊的通行证任务，该任务永久有效，其完成进度不会因通行证结束而重置，可在任意一期协议通行证开放期间完成启程任务并领取奖励。启程任务全部完成后，相关界面将在次日服务器时间04:00关闭。
 
<@intru.bold>- 通行证武器说明 -</>
每一期协议通行证的「源石配给」和「协议定制」分别包含一个武器补给。
每期协议通行证的武器补给均为定制。当期武器补给的可选武器范围，较往期协议通行证中武器补给的范围可能会有所调整。已经推出的通行证中的武器补给，所包含的武器不会因其他条件发生变化。
【协议化武器原型】可为所有协议通行证的武器补给所包含的武器提升潜能，对于未来协议通行证的武器补给中新增的武器同样有效。

<@intru.bold>- 特殊说明 -</>
当期协议通行证结束后，若存在未领取的等级奖励，该奖励将通过邮件发送至邮箱。
如因特殊情况导致过量购买「协议定制」，「协议定制」奖励不会叠加，同时根据购买价格返还对应数量的【衍质源石】。

<@intru.bold>- 兑换惊喜箱说明 -</>
【兑换惊喜箱】包括【中号兑换惊喜箱】、【大号兑换惊喜箱】。
【兑换惊喜箱】将在获取时自动开启，固定包含一份随机嵌晶玉奖励和一份随机培养素材奖励。

※ 随机奖励获得概率
· 【中号兑换惊喜箱】
嵌晶玉奖励：嵌晶玉×20（5%）/嵌晶玉×15（35%）/嵌晶玉×10（60%）
培养素材奖励：折金票×5000（15%）/折金票×3000（10%）/初级认知载体×10（15%）/初级认知载体×5（10%）/武器检查套组×2（15%）/武器检查套组×1（10%）/协议棱柱组×2（15%）/协议棱柱组×1（10%）
· 【大号兑换惊喜箱】
嵌晶玉奖励：嵌晶玉×30（5%）/嵌晶玉×25（35%）/嵌晶玉×20（60%）
培养素材奖励：折金票×12000（12.5%）/折金票×7500（12.5%）/高级认知载体×2（12.5%）/高级认知载体×1（12.5%）/武器检查套组×5（12.5%）/武器检查套组×3（12.5%）/协议棱柱组×5（12.5%）/协议棱柱组×3（12.5%）
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Protocol Pass -</>
Every item on the Protocol Pass is gathered from official operator interviews conducted by the Arsenal Engineers. These items include support projects that everyone hopes to see.
Activating each seasonal Protocol Pass unlocks the [Basic Supply] tier by default.
The [Protocol Customized] tier can be purchased, while the [Originium Supply] tier can be unlocked by spending [Origeometry].

<@intru.bold>- Protocol Pass EXP and Levels -</>
There are 2 major ways to earn Protocol Pass EXP, which then levels up the Protocol Pass and grants you rewards.
· Complete Pass Missions (some missions will become available after meeting certain criteria).
· Take part in [Operational Manual - Daily Tasks] and claim the rewards for reaching max daily Activity points.
※ If max Activity points is not reached for the day, 1 Vacation Tag will be activated at 4:00 AM (Server Time) of the following day. Up to 3 tags can be activated.
※ After earning max Activity Points and claiming the rewards, 1 activated Vacation Tag will be consumed to give double Pass EXP (Daily task rewards are not affected by this).

Even after maxing the seasonal Protocol Pass level, you can still earn Pass EXP with the aforementioned methods and acquire cyclical rewards. There is no limit to earning Pass EXP that exceed the level cap.

※ Special EXP bonus details: Unlocking [Originium Supply] / [Protocol Customized] tiers of the seasonal Protocol Pass grants +3% / +3% EXP bonus respectively. Unlocking both tiers grants a +6% EXP bonus.

<@intru.bold>- Protocol Pass Missions Details -</>
· Weekly Missions: During the Protocol Pass season, weekly missions become available every 7 days. Weekly missions will be reset when the pass season ends.
· Horizons Missions: These are a special type of Protocol Pass missions that are permanently available. Horizons Missions progress will not be reset when the pass season ends, meaning that these missions can be performed during any pass season to claim their rewards. When all Horizons Missions are completed, its special screen will be closed at 4:00 AM (Server Time) of the following day.
 
<@intru.bold>- Protocol Pass Weapons Details -</>
For each pass season, the [Originium Supply] and [Protocol Customized] tiers each contain a special weapon supply.
Every pass season has its own weapon supplies. In other words, weapon supplies from a current season may give a list of weapon choices that differ from those of previous seasons. Also, lists of weapon choices from seasons already released will not change.
[Protocolized Weapon Patterns] can raise the potential of any weapon provided by Protocol Pass weapon supplies, including weapon supplies from future pass seasons.

<@intru.bold>- Special Rules -</>
When the Protocol Pass season ends, any unclaimed pass level rewards shall be sent to your Mail.
· For excessive purchases of [Protocol Customized] due to special circumstances, rewards from [Protocol Customized] tier will not stack. Instead, an amount of [Origeometry] based on the value of the purchase will be returned to you.

<@intru.bold>- Exchange Crate-o-Surprise Details -</>
[Exchange Crates-o-Surprise] come in 2 types: (1) Exchange Crate-o-Surprise [M] and (2) Exchange Crate-o-Surprise [L].
[Exchange Crates-o-Surprise] are automatically opened when acquired. Crate contents are fixed: a random Oroberyl reward and a random progression material reward.

※ Crate-o-Surprise Random Rewards Drop Rates
· Exchange Crate-o-Surprise [M]
Oroberyls: Oroberyl×20 (5%) / Oroberyl×15 (35%) / Oroberyl×10 (60%)
Progression Materials: T-Creds×5000 (15%) / T-Creds×3000 (10%) / Elementary Cognitive Carrier×10 (15%) / Elementary Cognitive Carrier×5 (10%) / Arms INSP Set×2 (15%) / Arms INSP Set×1 (10%) / Protohedron×2 (15%) / Protohedron×1 (10%）
· Exchange Crate-o-Surprise [L]
Oroberyls: Oroberyl×30 (5%) / Oroberyl×25 (35%) / Oroberyl×20 (60%)
Progression Materials: T-Creds×12000 (12.5%) / T-Creds×7500 (12.5%) / Advanced Cognitive Carrier×2 (12.5%) / Advanced Cognitive Carrier×1 (12.5%) / Arms INSP Set×5 (12.5%) / Arms INSP Set×3 (12.5%) / Protohedron×5 (12.5%) / Protohedron×3 (12.5%）

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 线索传递 -</>
<@gray.note>· 好友间可进行线索传递。管理员可以向好友传递线索，也可以接收好友赠予的线索。</>
<@gray.note>· 传递的线索存在有效期限，到期后未使用则会失效。</>
<@gray.note>· 在接收好友赠予的线索后，这些线索会单独存放在会客室的接收线索库中，不会占用自有线索库容量。</>

<@intru.bold>- 信用奖励 -</>
<@gray.note>· 在会客室中，接收好友赠予的线索可获得信用奖励。每日前3次接收线索可分别获得25点、15点和5点信用，即每日获得上限为45点信用。</>
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Sending / Receiving Clues -</>
<@gray.note>· Friends can send and receive clues with each other. Clues can be sent to friends, and we may receive clues from them as well, Endministrator.</>
<@gray.note>· Sent clues have an expiration time and will become invalid if not used before it expires.</>
<@gray.note>· After receiving a clue sent from a friend, it will be stored in the incoming clue library and will not take up spaces in the local clue library.</>

<@intru.bold>- Credit Rewards -</>
<@gray.note>· In the Reception Room, receiving clues from your friends can earn you credits. The first 3 clues received per day gives 25, 15, and 5 credits respectively, for a max of 45 credits per day.</>

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 醚质 -</>
在野外探索时，偶尔能获得到一种特殊物品——醚质。醚质可能会直接散落于世界中，也可能需要完成世界探索中的某些挑战后才能获得。

<@intru.bold>- 醚质提交 -</>
可以在任意的协议传送点提交已经获取的醚质，提交醚质后，可以获取一些对于探索有帮助的道具或能力。需要注意的是，每个地区的醚质是独立计数的，提交时只能提交当前地区的醚质，例如在四号谷地只能提交在四号谷地获得的醚质。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Aurylene -</>
Wildland explorers may occasionally encounter special items scattered throughout the world known as the Aurylene. Completing certain exploration challenges may be required to collect some of them.

<@intru.bold>- Submitting Aurylene -</>
Collected Aurylenes can be submitted at any TP Point to get items or boosts that may support exploration efforts. Keep in mind that Aurylene collection progress is independently tracked in various regions. Aurylene submission is also region-specific. For example, Aurylenes collected in Valley IV can only be submitted to Valley IV TP Points.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 生产助力 -</>
<@gray.note>· 拜访好友时，可对其总控中枢与舱室进行生产助力。</>
<@gray.note>· 为好友助力可获得信用奖励，同时使好友获得特定加成效果。</>
<@gray.note>· 每日可进行生产助力的次数有上限。</>

<@intru.bold>- 情报交流 -</>
<@gray.note>· 开启会客室情报区后，在好友开展情报交流期间，可参与其会客室的情报交流。</>
<@gray.note>· 参与好友会客室的情报交流可获得信用奖励，同时为好友提供额外奖励。</>
<@gray.note>· 每日可进行参与情报交流的次数有上限。</>
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Production Assist -</>
<@gray.note>· When visiting friends, you can provide production assist to their cabins or Control Nexus. </>
<@gray.note>· Assist a friend to earn credits and grant the friend special bonuses. </>
<@gray.note>· There is a daily limit to Production Assists.</>

<@intru.bold>- Clue Exchange -</>
<@gray.note>· After activating the Reception Room Intel Section, you can visit your friends' ships and take part in their Clue Exchanges at their Reception Rooms.</>
<@gray.note>· Taking part in Clue Exchange at a friend's Reception Room earns you credit rewards. Your friend will also get bonus rewards.</>
<@gray.note>· You can only take part in a limited number of Clue Exchanges per day.</>

content.cn:
· 可花费信用兑换干员养成材料、武器养成材料等重要资源。注意信用有缓存上限，溢出的部分每日会被清空，请及时使用。

· 拜访好友飞船对其舱室进行生产助力可获取信用。
· 拜访好友飞船参与其会客室开展的情报交流可获取信用。
content.en:
· Credits can be traded for key resources such as operator/weapon progression materials. NOTE: The credit cache is limited and additional credits exceeding the limit will be cleared out on a daily basis. Try to spend the credits on time.

· Earn credits by visiting a friend's ship and providing Production Assists to their cabins.
· Earn credits by visiting a friend's ship and taking part in Clue Exchange at their Reception Room.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 将运送任务进行委托 -</>
· 接取运送任务后，可通过任务界面左下角的[转交运送委托]按钮，将运送任务转交至运送委托列表。

<@intru.bold>- 接取他人的运送委托 -</>
· 在运送委托列表，每日可接取完成最多3个他人的运送委托。
· 当委托的送货点处于管理员当前无法到达的区域时，无法接取该委托。
· 接取他人运送委托后，取到的货物完整度为100%。接取他人的运送委托无法再次进行转交。

<@intru.bold>- 运送委托奖励与过期规则 -</>
· 将运送转交至委托列表后，如果有人接取并完成，则委托人和完成者均根据完成时的货物完整度获得相同的尾款奖励。委托人可以在我转交的委托界面领取尾款奖励。
· 将运送转交至委托列表后，接取者需要在接取后的3天内完成运送任务，否则此委托将过期。接取者无法获得运送奖励，委托人可以在我转交的委托界面领取有一定折损的尾款奖励。
· 将运送转交至委托列表后，如果无人接取，委托将于转交后的第3日过期。委托人可以在我转交的委托界面领取有一定折损的尾款奖励。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Transferring Delivery Jobs -</>
· After accepting a delivery job, you can transfer it by using the [Transfer Job] button at the bottom left of the Mission screen. This posts it to the List of Delivery Jobs.

<@intru.bold>- Accepting Transferred Delivery Jobs -</>
· You can accept and complete up to 3 delivery jobs posted by other players on the List of Delivery Jobs.
· If a delivery job's destination is in an area beyond your reach, you cannot accept that job.
· After accepting a transferred delivery job, the goods will start with 100% Integrity. The transferred delivery job you accepted cannot be transferred again.

<@intru.bold>- Transferred Delivery Job Rewards and Expiration Rules  -</>
· Once a delivery job is added to the List of Delivery Jobs, if someone accepts and completes the job, then both the client and the deliverer will receive the same Final Fee based on the goods integrity of the delivery. Job clients can claim the Final Fee from the Jobs I Transferred tab.
· After accepting a job from the List of Delivery Jobs, you must complete the job within 3 days or the job will expire and you will not get any delivery rewards. Clients will only get a fraction of the Final Fee from the Jobs I Transferred tab.
· A job posted to the List of Delivery Jobs will expire after 3 days if no one accepts it. The client will only receive a fraction of the Final Fee from the Jobs I Transferred tab.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 基质预刻写 -</>
· 管理员可以在重度能量淤积点处进行基质预刻写。

· 可进入属性选择界面，选定至少三条基础属性以及一条附加属性或技能属性，完成基质预刻写。

· 完成重度能量淤积点挑战后可获得奖励基质，其属性刻写规则如下：
1. 必定出现三条预刻写基础属性中的一条；
2. 必定出现一条预刻写附加属性或技能属性；
3. 其余属性将在该重度能量淤积点的属性库中随机刻写。

· 不同位置的重度能量淤积点可刻写的属性不同。

· 预刻写效果生效时，需要在领取基质奖励时消耗当前地区的刻写券。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Essence Pre-Engraving -</>
· Essence pre-engraving can be performed at the Severe Energy Alluvium.

· This opens up a stats selection screen. Choose at least 3 attribute stats and 1 secondary stat or skill stat to complete essence pre-engraving.

· Completing the Severe Energy Alluvium challenge rewards an essence, whose stats engraving is based on the following rules: 
1. One of the stats is guaranteed to be 1 of the 3 attribute stats selected during pre-engraving;
2. One of the stats is guaranteed to be the 1 secondary stat or skill stat selected during pre-engraving;
3. The remaining stats shall be a random choice from the Severe Energy Alluvium selection of stats.

· Different Severe Energy Alluvium sites offer different pre-engraving stats.

· When claiming the essence rewarded, you must spend engraving permits of the local region to activate the pre-engraved stats.

content.cn:
欢迎管理员使用“蓝图分享”功能，您可在此生成[蓝图分享码]，并将您设计的[蓝图]分享给他人查看与使用。在使用本功能前，请管理员务必知悉并确认：

<@intru.bold>一旦您选择生成并分享[蓝图分享码]，即视为您授权不特定第三方查看、复制或使用该蓝图内容。</>

※ 请管理员自行判断是否继续分享。
content.en:
Welcome to the [Share Blueprint] feature, Endministrator. Use this feature to generate [blueprint sharing codes] and share [blueprints] you designed so others can reference and/or use them. Before using this feature, please understand and agree that: 

<@intru.bold>By sharing a [blueprint sharing code], you also authorize any third party to view, duplicate, and/or use the contents of the blueprint shared by the said code.</> 

※ It is up to your own discretion if you wish to continue sharing your blueprint, Endministrator.

title.cn: 集成工业系统及蓝图功能使用声明
title.en: AIC Factory and Blueprints Usage Disclaimer

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 集成工业系统 - 无人托管运行 -</>
· 管理员离线时，协议核心将进入无人托管状态，并自主控制集成工业系统运行。
· 为避免安全隐患，若长时间未检测到管理员上线，协议核心将自动关停集成工业系统。
· 当管理员再次上线时将会自动接管协议核心，集成工业系统恢复正常运行，无人托管运行时间则会重置。
 
· 无人托管最长运行时间：7天
 
<@intru.bold>- 集成工业系统 - 运行地区限制 -</>
· 因为运行算力限制，集成工业系统仅支持在至多两个地区运行。
· 可运行地区一：管理员当前主线任务最新解锁的协议核心所在地区；
· 可运行地区二：除地区一以外，管理员最近停留的地区。
· 除上述两个地区外，其他地区的集成工业系统将被暂时关停。
· 可在协议管理界面查看当前地区的集成工业系统运行状态。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- AIC Factory: Auto Management -</>
· When the Endministrator goes offline, the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) will enter an auto-management mode to keep the AIC Factory running.
· For safety concerns, if the Endministrator is offline for extended periods of time, the PAC will automatically switch off the AIC Factory.
· The Endministrator will automatically resume control over the PAC when going back online. The AIC Factory will resume work normally and the auto-management operation timer will be reset.

· Auto-management duration limit: 7 days

<@intru.bold>- AIC Factory: Regional Restrictions -</>
· Auto-management can only be maintained for AIC Factories in 2 regions due to algorithmic limitations.
· AIC Factory Auto-Management Region 1: The latest unlocked PAC region in the Endministrator's current main mission progress.
· AIC Factory Auto-Management Region 2: Another region where the Endministrator most recently visited.
· All other regional AIC Factories will be temporarily switched off.
· Go to the Protocol Management screen to view the operational status of the AIC Factory in the local region.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 拜访参观 -</>
· 拜访好友飞船，可以参观好友所展示的干员留影、陈列品、蚀刻章、干员履历及武器。

<@intru.bold>- 生产助力 -</>
· 拜访好友飞船，对好友的总控中枢与舱室进行生产助力可以获得信用奖励，同时对方也将获得特定的加成效果。
· 每日可对好友进行助力的总次数有上限。

<@intru.bold>- 情报交流 -</>
· 在好友开启情报交流期间，可通过拜访其会客室的访客终端进行参与。
· 参与情报交流可获得信用奖励，同时为好友提供额外收益。
· 每日可参与的情报交流次数有限。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Visiting -</>
· Visit a friend's ship to see operator snapshots, display items, engraved medals, operator CVs, and weapons showcased by the friend.

<@intru.bold>- Production Assist -</>
· Visit a friend's ship and offer Production Assist at their Control Nexus and ship cabins to earn credits. The friend will also receive specific production bonuses.
· There is a daily limit to Production Assists that can be offered to friends.

<@intru.bold>- Clue Exchange -</>
· When a friend has activated Clue Exchange, visit their Reception Room and interact with the Guest Terminal to take part in it.
· Taking part in a Clue Exchange earns you credits and gives the friend bonus benefits as well.
· There is a daily limit to Clue Exchange participation.

content.cn:
协议核心提供的简报会展示以下数据： 

<@intru.bold>- 产能效率数据 -</>
· 产物信息：展示了对应地区集成工业系统可生产的产物种类以及本地仓储数量。管理员可星标指定产物，被星标的产物会在该简报界面中置顶显示。
· 产率/消耗率走势：展示了各种产物在一定时间段内的实际产率及实际消耗率（单位：个/分钟）的变化走势。
· 当前数据：统计了各种产物的当前实际生产率及消耗率（单位：个/分钟）。
· 理论数据：不考虑物品在仓储中的上限，根据当前已接入电网的工业设备数量，推算出的各种产物的生产率及消耗率（单位：个/分钟）。

<@intru.bold>- 电能效率数据 -</>
· 电能报告：统计了一定时间段内对应地区协议核心的总发电量，展示了对应地区工业设备的总耗电量的变化数据。

※管理员可在简报中筛选数据，查看不同地区、不同条件下的统计结果。
content.en:
The Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) report will display the following statistics: 

<@intru.bold>- Production Efficiency -</>
· Product Info: This displays the types of products that can be produced by the AIC Factory and the size of the local Depot. The Endministrator can star-mark specified products to pin them at the top of the report screen.
· Yield / Usage Curve: Displays the actual yield and usage of a product (in units/min) within a specific range of time.
· Current Data: Actual yield and usage (in units/min) compiled at the current moment.
· Theoretical Data: Theoretical yield and usage (in units/min) calculated based on the number of AIC Factory facilities connected to the grid.

<@intru.bold>- Electrical Efficiency -</>
· Power Grid Report: Total regional PAC power output within a specific time range. Also displays changes in total power consumption of AIC Factory facilities in the region.

※ The Endministrator may sort and filter data in the PAC Report to view the statistics of various regions in various conditions.

content.cn: 部分关卡支持深潜模式。深潜模式在探索等级5级后自动开启，挑战对应关卡，可消耗理智获得奖励。
content.en: Deep Dive Mode is automatically available at Exploration Level 5 and can be used for certain stages. Challenge the stages in Deep Dive Mode and spend Sanity to win rewards.

<@intru.bold>- Event Rules -</>

<@gray.note>· Progress milestones and routine rewards will be reset every Monday.</>

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 参与条件 -</>
<@gray.note>· 管理员权限等阶≥3级</>
<@gray.note>· 完成主线任务：第一章 - 进程Ⅰ - 谷地重启</>
<@gray.note>· 连续未登录游戏天数≥21天</>
<@gray.note>· 距离上一次参与「协议重连」活动≥42天</>
<@gray.note>· 管理员的回归状态持续时间，与「协议重连」活动开启时间保持一致</>

<@intru.bold>- 活动规则 -</>
<@gray.note>· 管理员首次进入「协议重连」活动网页时，即可领取一次协议重连奖励。</>
<@gray.note>· 活动期间，管理员在「协议重连」网页内，可参与「重连签到」活动和「重连任务」活动，并获得丰富奖励。</>
<@gray.note>· 活动期间，管理员在「重连签到」活动中每日进行签到，即可领取签到奖励，共可签到7次。</>
<@gray.note>· 活动期间，管理员在「重连任务」活动中完成对应任务后，可获得活动积分以及奖励，积分达到一定数量，还可以获得额外奖励。</>
<@gray.note>「重连任务」中的任务统计可能存在延迟，若管理员已完成任务所需条件，但对应任务未完成，请等待2~5分钟。</>
<@gray.note>· 所有活动奖励将通过邮箱立即发放，邮件有效期为30天，请管理员及时查收领取。</>
<@gray.note>· 活动将在管理员参与14天后，于服务器时间4:00关闭。</>
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Participation Requirements -</>
<@gray.note>· Endministrator Authority Level ≥ 3</>
<@gray.note>· Complete main mission [Chapter Ⅰ Process Ⅰ: Valley Reboot]</>
<@gray.note>· Not logged into the game for ≥ 21 consecutive days</>
<@gray.note>· Participation in the last [Protocol Reconnection] event ≥ 42 days ago</>
<@gray.note>· Duration of your Return status is the same as the event period of the [Protocol Reconnection] event.</>

<@intru.bold>- Event Rules -</>
<@gray.note>· Visiting the [Protocol Reconnection] event page for the first time gives a Protocol Reconnection reward.</>
<@gray.note>· During the event, visit the [Protocol Reconnection] page and earn rewards by taking part in [Reconnection Sign-In] and [Reconnection Tasks] events.</>
<@gray.note>· During the event, perform sign-ins at [Reconnection Sign-In] everyday to earn rewards. Daily sign-ins can be performed for 7 times.</>
<@gray.note>· During the event, complete various [Reconnection Tasks] to earn event points and rewards. Earning enough points also gives extra rewards.</>
<@gray.note>Data tallying for [Reconnection Tasks] may experience slight delays. After completing task requirements, you may have to wait 2-5 minutes before the task is completed.</>
<@gray.note>· All event rewards will be sent to your in-game Mail. Reward mail will expire in 30 days so claim them on time, Endministrator.</>
<@gray.note>· The event will end 14 days after your participation and close at 4:00 AM (server time).</>

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 参与条件 -</>
<@gray.note>· 活动中心解锁后</>

<@intru.bold>- 活动规则 -</>
<@gray.note>· 活动期间，管理员可以根据干员们的喜好为他们制作心仪的贺卡，完成关卡挑战，并获得干员们的新春祝福。</>
<@gray.note>· 活动内共有7个对应关卡，后4个关卡将在活动开启后的指定时间解锁。</>
<@gray.note>· 完成活动内指定任务即可获得丰厚奖励。</>
<@gray.note>· 完成指定任务后，奖励将通过游戏内邮件立即发放，邮件有效期为30天，请管理员及时领取。</>
<@gray.note>· 完成任意3个关卡后，即可开启“自由创作”关卡，分享创作的贺卡可获得奖励。</>

<@gray.note>※退出“自由创作”关卡后，贺卡无法自动保存，请管理员酌情保存创作的贺卡作品。</>
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Participation Requirements -</>
<@gray.note>· After the Event Center is unlocked.</>

<@intru.bold>- Event Rules -</>
<@gray.note>· During the event, craft holiday cards based on what the operators like and complete various stage challenges. Your operators will give you their spring fest greetings as well.</>
<@gray.note>· The event has 7 stages. The last 4 stages will be unlocked at a specific date during the event.</>
<@gray.note>· Complete event missions to earn generous rewards.</>
<@gray.note>· After completing a mission, the rewards will be sent to your in-game Mail. Reward mail will expire in 30 days so claim them on time, Endministrator.</>
<@gray.note>· Complete any 3 stages to unlock the Free Crafting stage. Use it to craft and share custom cards for rewards.</>

<@gray.note>※ Exiting the Free Crafting stage does not auto-save your work, Endministrator, so remember to save manually.</>

title.en: [A Spring Note, Warmly Crafted] Event Details

content.cn:
· 使用一键存放功能时，已勾选类型的物品将会自动存放到仓库中，未勾选类型的物品则会保留在背包中。
· 当仓库中物品的存储已达上限时，一键存放会自动销毁超出上限的物品。
content.en:
· When using the Quick Stash function, items of ticked categories will be automatically moved to the Depot. Items of unticked categories will remain in the Backpack.
· When Depot storage is maxed, Quick Stash will automatically destroy items that exceed this limit.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 监测终端 -</>
· 观测站会根据当地的环境监测情况或科研需求，在当地监测终端上发布监测委托。
· 提升监测终端的操作等级，可增加委托栏位、接到更多不同的委托。

<@intru.bold>- 监测委托 -</>
· 监测委托的目标是前往武陵地区各处拍摄监测对象。
· 接取委托后，使用拍照功能成功拍摄到指定区域附近的监测对象，即可完成委托。
· 监测终端解锁后会刷新全部委托，此后每两天服务器时间04:00时会刷新一个委托，如果监测终端的委托栏中没有已完成的委托或者空栏，将不会刷新。
· 提升监测终端的操作等级后，下次刷新委托时会出现新操作等级下的委托。

<@intru.bold>- 生态总录 -</>
· 收录了本监测终端已完成的所有种类的委托内容。
· 根据已完成的委托种类数量， 可在生态总录处获得特殊奖励。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Monitoring Terminals -</>
· The Environment Monitoring Station references local environment monitoring surveys and R&D requests to post monitoring jobs at the local monitoring terminal.
· Leveling up the monitoring terminal adds more job slots and makes different jobs available.

<@intru.bold>- Monitoring Jobs -</>
· The goal of monitoring jobs is to photograph various monitoring targets in the region of Wuling.
· To complete an accepted job, use the Camera action to photograph the monitoring targets in the specified areas.
· Once unlocked, the monitoring terminal will create a list of monitoring jobs and refresh 1 job every 2 days at 4:00 AM (server time). No jobs will be refreshed if the monitoring terminal has no completed jobs or has no empty job slots.
· After leveling up the monitoring terminal, the next refresh will create new jobs based on the new operations level of the monitoring terminal.

<@intru.bold>- Ecology Overview -</>
· The Overview lists the monitoring jobs completed at the local monitoring terminal.
· Complete enough jobs and types of jobs to claim special rewards at the Ecology Overview.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 库存传输 -</>
· 库存传输是一种在仓库间运输物品的方式，可以将所选物品从出发地仓库转移到目的地仓库。
 
<@intru.bold>- 超库存传输 -</>
· 提升出发地仓库的所属地区建设等级，可解锁新的传输方式：超库存传输。
· 超库存传输可以将出发地可生产的任意一种物品，按照设定数量，传输至目的地仓库。
· 无论出发地仓库中是否有该物品库存，均可完成传输，且不会实际消耗出发地的物品库存。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Stockpile Transfer -</>
· Stockpile Transfer is a method of transferring items between depots. It moves selected items from the source depot to the destination depot.

<@intru.bold>- Metastorage Transfer -</>
· Raising the Regional Development Level of the source region unlocks a new transfer mode: Metastorage Transfer.
· Metastorage Transfer can transfer a selected quantity of a selected type of item that can be produced at the source region, and move them to the destination depot.
· Metastorage Transfer is completed without reducing the stockpile of the selected item in the source depot, and can even be completed even if the source depot has none of the selected item.

content.cn:
· 传输总值表示每一批跨地区传输的物品总价值。
· 管理员可以在物品图标上查看单位物品价值。

· 可传输物品数量上限=传输总值/单位物品价值
 
· 传输总值会随着出发地的所属地区建设等级提升而增加。
content.en:
· Total Transfer Value (TTV) is the total value of items that can be moved with a single regional transfer.
· The unit value of every item is marked on its icon.

· Max Number of Items Transferable = TTV / Unit Value of the Item
 
· TTV increases with the regional development level of the source region.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 邮箱 -</>
· 用于保存管理员收到的邮件及其附件。
· 邮件在过期后将会被自动删除，请管理员及时查看并领取附件物品，邮箱达到邮件存储上限后，若继续收到新邮件，将会自动删除即将过期的旧邮件。
· 有星星标记的邮件会置顶显示，并且删除已读邮件操作不会删除有星星标记的邮件。可以在界面上手动取消或标上星星标记。

<@intru.bold>- 暂存区 -</>
· 用于保存管理员因各种原因遗失的物品。
· 因仓储空间已满、未能及时收集或其他原因而遗失的重要物品会放入暂存区，没有遗失物品时暂存区入口会隐藏。暂存区最多可保留500件遗失物，达到暂存区上限后，更多遗失的重要物品将无法再进入暂存区，请管理员及时清理，避免不必要的损失。
· 领取暂存区中的物品时，需保证有足够的仓储空间，否则无法成功领取。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Mail -</>
· Your Mail features an Inbox for storing incoming mail and mail attachments you receive, Endministrator. 
· Expired mail will be automatically deleted. Check the Inbox often and claim the mail attachments before they disappear. When the Inbox is full, the oldest mail will be deleted for every new mail received. 
· Starred mail will be pinned to the top. Deleting all read mail will not delete any of the starred mail. You can manually star or unstar the mail by clicking the star icon directly. 

<@intru.bold>- Mail Cache -</>
· Your Mail also has a Cache for storing lost and/or missed items, Endministrator.
· Items lost and/or missed due to full storage, inability to pick up the object in time, or other reasons will be placed in the Cache. The Cache portal will be hidden if you have no lost and/or missed items. The Cache can hold up to 500 items. Once the Cache is full, no more items lost and/or missed can be placed in the Cache. Clean your Cache from time to time to avoid unnecessary losses, Endministrator. 
· Make sure you have enough storage space when retrieving items from the Cache. You cannot retrieve items from the Cache if your storage is full.

content.cn:
1. 귀하는 구매일 또는 구매한 아이템이 이용 가능하게 된 날(둘 중 늦은 날)로부터 7일 이내에 환불을 요청할 수 있습니다. 단, 관련 아이템을 이미 사용한 경우에는 구매를 취소할 수 없습니다.
2.  다음의 경우에는 구매를 취소할 수 없습니다: 1) 구매한 아이템을 사용하거나 활성화한 경우; 2) 구매한 아이템에 추가 프로모션 또는 번들 콘텐츠가 포함되어 있고, 해당 콘텐츠의 전부 또는 일부를 사용한 경우; 3) 아이템이 개봉 시 사용된 것으로 간주되거나, 개봉 시 그 효용이 결정되는 경우. 구체적으로, 아이템 또는 선물 받은 콘텐츠를 사용했거나, 구매한 제품에 즉시 효력이 발생하는 아이템(예: 월간 카드, 배틀패스, 선물 팩 등)이 포함된 경우에는 구매를 취소할 수 없습니다.
3. 귀하가 구매를 취소하거나 거래가 기타 사유로 무효로 간주되는 경우, 당사는 귀하의 계정에서 해당 콘텐츠를 차감하거나 관련 법령에 따라 기타 합리적이고 필요한 조치를 취할 권리가 있습니다.
4. 환불에 관한 문의사항이 있으시면 게임 내 고객센터 또는 지원 이메일 support@gryphline.com 으로 연락해 주시기 바랍니다.

content.cn:
<@intru.bold>- 赠送礼物 -</>
· 赠送礼物可以提升干员对管理员的信赖度。
· 礼物可在各地区物资调度员处购买获得。

<@intru.bold>- 干员爱好 -</>
· 请注意，干员只会接受符合其爱好的礼物。
· 赠送符合干员偏好的礼物或当前为流行品的礼物，都可提供更多的信赖。
· 流行品状态有时间限制，在结束前会显示倒计时，结束后将不再提供流行品状态的额外信赖，请留意具体时限。

<@intru.bold>- 每日信赖度提升限制 -</>
· 每位干员通过赠礼所能提升的信赖值设有每日上限。
· 当某位干员当日所提升的信赖达到特定值后，继续通过赠礼提升的信赖将会减少。
content.en:
<@intru.bold>- Offer Gifts -</>
· Gifts will raise the operators' trust in you.
· Gifts can be purchased from various regional Stock Redistributors. 

<@intru.bold>- Operator Hobbies -</>
· NOTE: Operators will only accept gifts that match their hobbies.
· Gifts that match the operator's preferences or are currently popular also lets you earn more trust with them. 
· Gifts will only remain popular for a while (displayed via a countdown timer). Watch the timer. Once it ends, the gift will no longer be popular nor offer extra trust.

<@intru.bold>- Daily Limit on Trust Increase -</>
· Every operator has a daily limit on the amount of trust that can be earned through gifting.
· When an operator's trust is increased by a certain value in the same day, subsequent gifts will give less trust.

content.cn:
· 探索中收集的陈列品可存放于行迹高塔内展示，供干员及来访好友参观。

· 干员观看时将根据个人爱好呈现不同反应；陈列品无实际增益效果。
content.en:
· The Tower of Trails is a showcase of various display items gathered during exploration. Displayed items can be seen by operators and visiting friends.

· Operators may react differently to display items according to their personal hobbies. Display items offer no actual buffs or benefits.

content.cn:
· 管理员在谷地像差中获得的沉积结核，每转化为1个醚质晶块，即可获得1点行动刻度。
· 完成部分委托也可以获得行动刻度。
· 行动刻度每达到一定档位，可领取一次性奖励。
content.en:
· After acquiring precipitation nodules from the Valley's Aberrants, every Aurylene Crystal converted gives 1 operation metrics. 
· Completing certain commissions always gives operation metrics. 
· Reach certain operation metrics milestones to claim a one-time reward.

content.cn:
· 管理员在谷地像差中获得的物品，由于强烈的紊乱影响，需要放置在隔绝封装器中。
· 隔绝封装器有容量上限，可以通过研发委托进行升级。
· 在撤离结算时，沉积结核将会转化为醚质晶块，而沉积具象物则会被收纳进贵重物品库。
content.en:
· Items gathered in the Valley's Aberrants are strongly affected by the ambient Derangement and must be placed within the Isolation Container.
· The Isolation Container has a storage limit. Complete Research Commissions to upgrade them.
· After extraction from the Valley's Aberrants and tallying the exploration attempt, all precipitation nodules collected will be converted to Aurylene Crystals while precipitation manifests will be placed in the Valuables Stash.

content.cn:
· 管理员在谷地像差中获得的沉积结核，可以转化为醚质晶块，转化比例由转化效率决定。
· 转化效率可以通过研发委托进行升级。
content.en:
· Precipitation nodules gathered from the Valley's Aberrants will be converted to Aurylene Crystals based on a certain conversion ratio.
· The conversion ratio can be improved by completing research commissions.

content.cn: · 同一能量淤积点，若每日挑战超过一定次数后，该能量淤积点挑战中敌人掉落的奖励将大幅减少。该效果将会在次日重置。
content.en: · Each Energy Alluvium has a daily challenge limit. Once the challenge limit is reached, enemies defeated in subsequent challenges will drop greatly reduced rewards. The daily limit is refreshed on the following day.

title.cn: 能量淤积点挑战限制说明
